label: 殿上人
本: Capital and Countryside in Japan, 300-1180:  Japanese Historians Interpreted in English . Cornell University East Asia Program . 2006
説明文: royal intimates, specifically designated by each tennô. From Uda Tennô’s reign (887-97) onward, they were given special permission to enter the royal presence, a prerogative known as shôden 昇殿. [天皇]
